message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/Oxford2010 

Dear Colleagues,
Two JISC-funded computing officer positions are available in my research group from 1st October, involving the application of semantic web technologies to the management of research datasets linked to journal articles.  These technically complex high-profile projects will prove both challenging and stimulating.  Copies of the adverts and further particulars are at
http://imageweb.zoo.ox.ac.uk/pub/2010/Job%20opportunities/
.  The closing date for receipt of applications is Wednesday 15 September 2010.
Dr David Shotton                                                       
Reader in Image Bioinformatics
david.shotton@zoo.ox.ac.uk
Image Bioinformatics Research Group
Department of Zoology, University of Oxford
South Parks Road, Oxford OX1 3PS, UK
http://ibrg.zoo.ox.ac.uk
tel: +44-(0)1865-271193
fax: +44-(0)1865-310447
speaker: SYSTEM
